results.definition: something that can be used as an official medium of payment
machine consisting of a heavy bar that moves vertically for pounding or crushing ores
treat or classify according to a mental stereotype
a small adhesive token stuck on a letter or package to indicate that that postal fees have been paid
a symbol that is the result of printing or engraving
examples: he put his stamp on the envelope

results.definition: a small piece of adhesive paper that is put on an object to show that a government tax has been paid
a device incised to make an impression; used to secure a closing or to authenticate documents
the distinctive form in which a thing is made
a block or die used to imprint a mark or design

examples: more men of his stamp are needed

results.definition: crush or grind with a heavy instrument
destroy or extinguish as if by stamping with the foot
form or cut out with a mold, form, or die
reveal clearly as having a certain character
examples: His playing stamps him as a Romantic

results.definition: to mark, or produce an imprint in or on something
examples: a man whose name is permanently stamped on our maps
